net.sourceforge.jasa.report
Class DirectRevelationReportVariables

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jabm.event.AbstractModel
      net.sourceforge.jabm.report.AbstractReportVariables
          net.sourceforge.jasa.report.DirectRevelationReportVariables
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.Model, net.sourceforge.jabm.report.Report, net.sourceforge.jabm.report.ReportVariables, net.sourceforge.jabm.report.XYReportVariables
Direct Known Subclasses:
EquilibriumReportVariables, SupplyAndDemandStats
public abstract class DirectRevelationReportVariables
extends net.sourceforge.jabm.report.AbstractReportVariables
implements net.sourceforge.jabm.report.ReportVariables, java.io.Serializable

This class computes the hypothetical market state when all agents bid at their private valuation, ie when all agents bid truthfully. This can be used, for example, for equilibrium calculations.

See Also:
